data.title: OneRepublic’s Ryan Tedder on the Band’s New Album and Getting Back into the Music Game

data.meta_site_name: COMBO - The Colorado Music Business Organization
data.text:
Photo: Ryan Tedder | By Anthony Mason, CBS News | Colorado’s own and OneRepublic frontman Ryan Tedder tours the Metropolitan Museum of Art with CBS’s Anthony Mason. The Grammy-winning songwriter and producer discusses OneRepublic’s new album, “Human,” recovering from burnout, and his love for collecting art and historic artifacts.

Go here to watch the entire interview:

https://www.cbsnews.com/video/ryan-tedder-tours-the-met-talks-new-onerepublic-album-mental-health-art-collection/

Did you know that Ryan is listed as a co-writer on the Jonas Bros. big hit, “I’m a Sucker for You”? Songwriters: Adam King Feeney / Joseph Jonas / Louis Bell / Nicholas Jerry Jonas / Ryan Tedder / Miles Ale / Paul Kevin Jonas II / Homer Steinweiss / Ahmed Mustafa

Sucker lyrics © Universal Music Publishing Group, Downtown Music Publishing, Sony/ATV Music Publishing LLC, BMG Rights Management, Kobalt Music Publishing Ltd.
